title: Interpretation of the vision of buying a shroud in a dream according to Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a shroud bought in a dream according to Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation. The shroud is the garment in which the dead person is wrapped after washing and preparing for burial. This is a dream that portends their death or the death of those close to them, knowing that the interpretation remains just a possibility. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a shroud in a dream according to Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a shroud in a dream. Dream interpretation jurists say that seeing a shroud in a dream indicates human failure. In a love story, but if a person sees in his dream that he is buying a shroud, this means that this person is selling this world for the future. They are not looking for worldly goods, and buying a shroud in a dream indicates piety. And justice in religion, but if one sees in his dream that he is buying a black shroud, it means that the person will gain more knowledge, but if one sees in his dream that he is buying a green shroud, then this indicates a journey or death on God’s path. If one sees in a dream that he is buying a green shroud, then this indicates a journey or death on God’s path. That he is wrapped in a shroud from head to toe, this indicates the death of the dreamer. The coffins of another dead person indicate the blessing of this person, but if someone sees that he is looking for a shroud and does not find it, this indicates the evil of this vision and may indicate that this person’s wealth is forbidden. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a shroud in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen said about seeing a shroud in The dream: It indicates concealment, and is a sign of repentance from sins. This indicates that the owner of this dream will receive a lot of money and blessings, but if one sees in his dream that he is choosing between the shrouds of the dead, this means that this person will have mercy on the dead and follow a path. But if he sees in his dream that he is wearing a white shroud of lust, this indicates his inclination towards adultery and forbidden things. If he knows that person, this indicates the death of that person, but if a person sees in a dream that he is removing a shroud from a person who has died, this means that he is following the path of this or that person. . Deprivation of livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a shroud in a dream for a married woman. Ibn Sirin says: Seeing a shroud in a married woman’s dream is evidence of sadness, distress, and exhaustion, and may indicate the death of the husband. However, if a woman sees in her dream that she is buying a white shroud, this indicates that protection and that God will grant her Her abundant strength. If she sees that she is buying a black shroud, this indicates exhaustion, sadness, worries, and problems in her life. However, if the color of the shroud is green, this indicates that she will soon become pregnant or obtain a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a shroud in a dream for a single girl. Dream interpretation lawyers say The shroud in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that those close to her are deceiving her and lying to her. Joy follows separation and sadness, but if a girl sees in her dream a black shroud, this indicates her illness and may indicate her death, but if she sees that she is buying a green shroud, this means that she will succeed. Her scientific life, and perhaps this indicates that she will soon have the opportunity to travel. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a contented person in a dream. Seeing a person wrapped in a dream is an undesirable dream. If it is unknown, it means worries and an indication of defeat. However, if the shroud is with

title: What is the interpretation of a married woman’s divorce in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Divorcing a married woman in a dream is the most hated thing that God forbids, because it leads to many problems, such as family disintegration, hatred, children feeling suffering, and a parent not raising them because of his involvement in that. they. The vision has many different signs and signals because it differs from one case to another. In this topic we will explain in detail all the signs from all sides. Follow this article. Divorce of a married woman in a dream. Divorce of a married woman in a dream indicates that the dreamer will protect her husband and that her life will change for the better. If she sees a woman Married: Her divorce from her husband. She was officially engaged to another man in a dream. This is a sign that she will receive advantages and benefits from this person whom she saw. Seeing a married woman divorcing her in a dream while in reality she was suffering from an illness is one of the good visions for her, because this It indicates that God Almighty will provide her with healing and complete recovery. If the married dreamer sees that her husband divorced her in her dream, and there were disagreements between her and a person in reality, then this is an indication of a reconciliation agreement between them. So whoever sees in her dream that her husband divorces her without excuse in this matter This is evidence that she will receive a lot of goodness and blessings from our Lord Almighty. The divorce of a married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Many scholars and jurists talk about visions of a divorce for a married woman in a dream, and among them is the scholar Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the divorce of a married woman in a dream as a sign. To completely reject her partner’s actions. If a married woman sees her divorce in her dream, this is evidence that she feels very sad and disturbed by the bad deeds she has committed in the past days and needs to seek forgiveness and apply to God Almighty to forgive her. Seeing a married woman divorcing her husband in a dream shows the extent of her anxiety about... For this to happen in reality, because there are many disagreements and sharp discussions between them in reality. Seeing a pregnant dreamer getting divorced in her dream symbolizes her development of herself and she will reach a high position in her work as a result of her effort. Divorcing a married woman in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen interprets the divorce of a married woman in a dream. As evidence that many positive changes have appeared in her life, and she will feel comfortable, satisfied and enjoyable. If a married woman sees that her husband is divorcing her in a dream, this is a sign that she will get rid of the difficulties and obstacles that she was facing. A married dreamer saw her husband divorcing her in a dream and she was happy because this happened to her It means that she will get a lot of money. Whoever sees in her dream that her husband has divorced her three times, this is a sign that God Almighty will grant her goodness and blessings will come to her life. Divorcing a married woman in a dream for a pregnant woman. Divorcing a married woman in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she will achieve Many victories and achievements in her life. If a pregnant dreamer sees her divorcing her husband in a dream and feels happy, this is a sign that she will enjoy a great future and will receive many blessings and enjoy the stability of her married life. If she sees...

title: Interpretation of dreams about falling from a high place

preview.html: As this vision is similar to the rest of the visions that express some good and happy things and some warnings of the appearance of something not good, which we will explain in this article, please follow us. Seeing a fall from a high place in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin says that a dream in which a person sees himself falling. From a high place. An expression that he will be attacked in order to complete something important to him in life. Seeing a fall may express that the owner of the candy will find another job. Or will travel to work. If the dreamer sees that there is a child falling from a high place. Evidence that the dreamer He will face a huge financial crisis in the coming days. When someone sees someone he knows falling from a height. Evidence that this person will go through many crises and problems during the coming period. As for the situation in which a person sees himself falling from a height, but he survives that fall. It is a sign that the dreamer will get rid of the various problems he is experiencing. Interpretation of falling from a high place for a single woman. The unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she is surviving a fall from above. Evidence that he will get rid of every problem she goes through in life. But when she sees that There is someone pushing her until she falls from a high place. It is evidence that there are many people chasing her. Also, seeing a single girl falling from a high place, but she has a beautiful and distinctive appearance. It shows the great goodness that this girl will enjoy. Also, seeing a single woman falling from a high place Without knowing that place is an expression of her anxiety and fear. A girl who sees herself falling from above could be a sign that the wedding date is approaching. It indicates seeing a fall with wounds and many bruises. Evidence that she is suffering from major obstacles in her life. Also, seeing Falling from a bad place is a sign of bad changes in life, and God knows best. An unmarried woman who dreams that she is falling from above is evidence of a short engagement, engagement, or marriage. See also: Interpretation of dreams about falling from a high place. Interpretation of a dream about falling from a high place for a married woman. A married woman sees In a dream, she falls from a high place. It expresses the existence of many disagreements with her husband. But these problems and disagreements will end soon, and God knows best. The situation in which one sees climbing to a high place. Evidence of a change in this woman’s status and their huge livelihood in the future. A married woman’s dream of falling from A height may indicate that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of a vision of falling from a high place for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman dreams of falling from a high place. Evidence that she will give birth easily, even if she falls without injury. When a pregnant woman sees that she has sustained wounds and injuries as a result of falling from a high place, evidence that she She will face a lot of troubles and troubles during the birth process. Ibn Sirin also believes that a pregnant woman who sees herself falling from above is an expression of her fear of childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about falling from above for a divorced woman. A divorced woman dreams of falling from above. Evidence that she will soon be freed from her worries and sisters. And God knows best. As for scenes

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a new house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of the new house: Seeing a new house in a dream indicates the transition from an old life to a new life and a new life. The new house replaces a new life full of happiness and joy if the house is beautiful and clean. Whoever sees a new house inside the dream and it is inhabited by a stranger, this is evidence of the dreamer’s sins. It is He saw that he is building a house of gold, this indicates that he is a person who loves hypocrisy and hypocrisy. Seeing that he is building a new house of iron, this indicates profit from the legitimate ones. Interpretation of seeing the new house of Nabulsi. Seeing the entrance to a strange new house suggests the Day of Judgment and the Hereafter. An abandoned house inside the dream indicates the grave. Seeing an unmarried young man or girl in a strange house in a dream indicates a new but unhappy life. Seeing moving to a new house indicates repentance from sins and transgressions. Seeing yourself entering a new house in a dream indicates a new life full of happiness. The new house in A man’s dream is evidence of his success and superiority. The new house is that he is able to travel outside the country for work. Interpretation of the vision of the new house for single people. If the girl sees that she is single, if he buys a new house, he will get a new life. The new house in the single’s dream is evidence of imminent marriage. Perhaps the new house is distance from friends The bad ones. Interpretation of seeing a new house for a married woman. The new house in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of a male child. Seeing a new house in a dream indicates the collapse of problems between the married woman and her husband. Interpretation of seeing a new house for a pregnant woman. The new house in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a male baby, and the new apartment. Female. A new house indicates an easy birth. If the house is beautiful, this indicates a difficult birth. Seeing a new house means good luck. Interpretation of seeing a man’s new house. Seeing a new house in a dream means a lot of money and getting a new job. A new house in a dream for a man also indicates Wealth. A man’s vision of a new house indicates that he will get married soon. A man’s new house is to change his life for the better. A new house in a man’s dream indicates the wife’s pregnancy. Seeing a married man buying a new house in a dream indicates the success of his children. Seeing a new house in a single person’s dream It is evidence of travel. Add the dream you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing prison in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a prison in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and the prison is in reality a place where criminals are placed, such as the thief, the murderer, the briber, and anyone who has committed a crime against the people or against the state. The law punishes with imprisonment for a certain period depending on the type of crime committed, and seeing the prison in a dream indicates tension, anxiety, and exposure to judgments and problems, as It indicates adversity and obstacles, and now it can almost indicate sins and desires, and for the pious, it indicates righteousness and piety, and in this article we will look at the interpretation of the vision of prison for men and women on the Al-Qimma website. Interpretation of imprisoning a sick person in a dream. Seeing a sick person in prison expresses the continuation of his illness. Seeing in Dreaming about escaping from prison: Seeing escaping from prison indicates the dreamer’s relief, the correction of his condition, and the death of worry and anxiety. Seeing a dead prisoner in a dream indicates a lack of good deeds, and the dead person’s need for prayer and zakat. An unmarried girl sees a prison in her dream. Her vision indicates the delay in marriage and the distress that he feels. Interpretation of a dream about entering prison for a married man: Seeing prison in a dream means financial crises, worry and anxiety. Seeing prison for an unmarried young man indicates the approaching marriage. If a married man, widow, or divorced person sees that he is imprisoned and he is not in reality, this indicates that he is facing a major problem in his life in Field of work, social or family problems. Imprisonment of a pious man shows an increase in faith and avoidance of disobedience and sins. Interpretation of a dream about my imprisoned son. Seeing prison in a dream is one of the visions that can herald good or evil. Seeing prison may indicate for a man poverty, need, or accumulation of debts. Prison can indicate death and the grave. Seeing prison doors opening in a dream of a sad and sad person can almost indicate relief. Interpretation of a dream about imprisoning someone I know If the dreamer sees that someone he hates is imprisoned in a dream, this means that he will get rid of his enemies and save him from worry and sadness. It also indicates the dismissal of spiteful conspirators and haters. Also, seeing the imprisonment of sinners and sinners may indicate the pursuit of desires and sins, and the vision is a warning to stay away from sins and avoid immorality. Interpretation of a dream about my imprisoned son: Seeing my son imprisoned in a dream means that this son is exposed to a psychological crisis. This vision may indicate However, he has committed a sin against him and needs to repent and turn away from the path of evil. The vision may indicate a problem that the dreamer or fortune teller will face. Interpretation of a dream about imprisonment and crying. Seeing imprisonment and crying suggests the nearness of relief, the end of crises, and overcoming difficult situations to which the viewer is exposed. Imprisonment is evidence of worry or anxiety. Or sadness or a psychological problem that haunts him. And if he sees that he is crying loudly and is imprisoned, this indicates a difficult stage that he is going through, but he will overcome it. And the prisoner’s screaming is in fact evidence of his release from prison and his release from torment. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced or widow being imprisoned and crying. Seeing a divorced woman Or a widow in prison indicates a difficult stage she is going through, but this stage will pass soon and God will reward her for many good deeds. Seeing prison and being acquitted of a charge indicates a collapse.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing a lock in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Dream Lock A lock is a piece of metal that various doors are closed with to keep the belongings inside from being stolen or stolen. Does he bring goodness or pain in his life? Accordingly, we will explain in detail in the following lines the connotations obtained by scholars in this regard. I am locked in a dream. In interpreting the dream of having a lock in a dream, its scholars mentioned several pieces of evidence, including the following: If a person sees in his dream that he is buying a new lock, this is a sign of his anxiety about That a certain thing will happen to him in his life and he seeks to prevent it in various possible ways and in the end he will be able to overcome the situation and live in security and peace. If he sees an old rusty lock during sleep, this means that the dreamer feels desperate for something and stops trying to get it, even though he He is close to achieving it. And if a person dreams that he is opening a lock using the key, this is a sign that the misery he is suffering from will end and he will earn a lot of money with which he can get what he wants. And when he sees in his dream that he is trying to open the lock with the key, but he cannot break it, The dream proves that he obtained wealth from a forbidden source, and gives himself a reason to commit this wrong act. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. It includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. The lock in a dream by Ibn Sirino. Here are the most important interpretations received by the scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin in the interpretation of a lock in a dream: If a person who has been imprisoned for many years sees that he is opening the lock without difficulty in a dream, this is a sign that he will soon be released from prison without completing the prison term and restoring his fragrant reputation to the world. When one dreams of a wooden lock and does not If a person is unable to open it, it will make it difficult to live as he wishes for a long period of his life. If the dreamer puts the lock on the door of his house when he leaves in the dream, this indicates his great concern for his family members and his fear of any harm or evil, especially his wife. If a person dreams that he is trying to open the lock and does not He can do this in any way, the dream symbolizes his inability to control the course of things around him and his constant feeling of failure. Lock in a Singles’ Dream If a girl dreams that there is a large lock in a place that she wants to enter, but she was able to open it easily, this leads to stability And the quiet and comfortable life she has in her life, in addition to her abilities. To achieve everything he desires. If an unmarried woman has a new lock in her dream, but it is lost unexpectedly, this is a sign that her secrets have been revealed or revealed to people. When a girl sees in her dream that she is breaking the lock, this is a sign that she She was disappointed and felt very sad, which makes her reconsider all aspects of her life and does not give her trust to anyone easily. Lock in a dream for a married woman If a woman sees during her sleep that her husband has a large lock in his hand, but she hid it behind his back, this is a sign that he is a severe person Caution, which makes her not bear his or her responsibility. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about someone giving money to an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about saving money for single women Is seeing giving money a good or bad sign? What are the negative interpretations of a dream about saving money? And what does giving money to children mean in a dream? In the following lines, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing giving money to an unmarried woman based on the words of Ibn Sirin and senior scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about saving money for single women Giving money to an unmarried woman in a dream indicates that her marriage contract is close to a wealthy man who has a lot of money and spends the most beautiful moments with him to pay off his debts. Commentators said that seeing giving money to an unmarried woman is considered evidence of the great development that will soon occur in her life, and it turns out that she will succeed in her studies and join the university she wants. It is said that if the dreamer sees one of her friends giving her money, this indicates friendship and mutual respect between them, and that she will achieve her ambitions and achieve all her goals soon. Some interpreters believe that if an unmarried woman sees her father giving her banknotes, this means that he mistreats her and this leads to aggravation of her psychological state and her feeling of sadness and pain, but if the owner of the dream takes money from someone. They have enemies, and this leads to the end of their enmity soon. Interpretation of a dream about giving money to an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin's interpretation of giving money to an unmarried woman indicates that her marriage to a man who has all the beautiful qualities and good morals that she desires is approaching, and if the owner of the dream is the one who gives money to someone he knows, this is a sign that this person will fall into a certain problem in the future and will need her help, so a helping hand should be offered to her. Ibn Sirin said that if the dreamer sees a beautiful person who does not know how to wear white clothes and give her money, this is a sign of positive changes that will soon occur in her life. Seeing the manager at work giving money to the dreamer means that he will be promoted in his job and reach an important administrative position the next day. A certain person in her life saw a man she knows giving her a lot of money, and this symbolizes liberation from her anxiety and removing worries from her shoulders. The online dream interpretation site is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just type online dream interpretation site Search for it in Google and get the correct interpretations. The most important interpretations of a dream about donating money to a single woman Interpretation of a dream about giving banknotes to a single woman Commentators said that a banknote for a single woman symbolizes her feeling of happiness and satisfaction and her liberation from the troubles and annoying things that she was going through in the previous period, but if the dreamer sees a stranger giving her bills and there is blood on it. This indicates her failure to perform prayers and duties, and the vision carries a message telling her to hurry up to repent before it is too late. Giving coins in a dream to a single woman Interpreters said that if a single woman sees in her dream a stranger giving her coins, this is a sign of obstacles that appear

title: Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with someone you love in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about quarreling with someone you love: Arguments and quarrels are among the things that disturb a person’s life and make him very sad, especially if that person is someone he loves or is close to him. By the way, in this article we will present the largest number of issues related to quarreling with a lover, going beyond the interpretations accepted by major scholars and commentators such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of quarreling with someone you love. Quarrel with someone the dreamer loves in a dream is one of the visions that carry many recognizable connotations and signs. Through the following cases: A dreamer who conflicts with someone he loves in reality and sees that he is quarreling with him in a dream indicates the end of the quarrel and the return of the relationship again better than before. A quarrel with a family member in a dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve his desires and goals that he has always sought. Seeing strangulation with someone the dreamer loves in a dream means happy news that the dreamer will receive, which makes him optimistic. Interpretation of a dream of a quarrel with someone you love by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin touched on the interpretation of a quarrel with someone the dreamer loves, and below are some of the interpretations he obtained. From him: A quarrel with someone you love according to Ibn Sirin in a dream indicates that there is a rivalry in reality and it will end soon. If the dreamer sees in the dream that he is arguing with someone he loves, this symbolizes the discoveries and good news that will happen to him in the coming period. Interpretation of dreams of fighting with someone you love For single people, the dream of quarreling with someone the dreamer loves depends on the social status he enjoys, especially the unmarried girl, and we will interpret this as follows: An unmarried girl who dreams that she is quarreling with someone she loves is a sign that she will hear bad news that will sadden her heart. It indicates Seeing a fight with someone in a dream indicates that there are people waiting to cause her problems and trials. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is quarreling with someone she loves and hitting her, this symbolizes her short marriage with him and she will live with him a happy, carefree life. Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel talking with someone she loves About being single: An unmarried girl who dreams that she is arguing with her deceased father indicates that she is on the wrong path and must return to God and hasten to repent. Talking about quarrels in a dream about an unmarried woman with her friends is a sign that she will enter into a project or business of her own in the future. The coming period. Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with someone she loves about a married woman. A married woman who dreams that she is arguing with someone she loves is an indication of the disputes that will arise between them in reality. A quarrel in a dream for a married woman with one of her family members is a sign of her feeling bad towards him and her anger towards him. If she dreams A married woman dreams that she is arguing with one of her family members and he hits her, this indicates that she will gain great benefit from him. Interpretation of a dream about quarreling with someone she loves about a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who dreams that she is arguing with someone she loves is considered a sign that her birth will be easy and that she and her fetus are in good health. Fighting in a dream with someone indicates...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an eye in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Dreaming of seeing an eye in a dream. Seeing an eye in a man’s dream means competing in doing good. A big eye indicates upcoming news, a red eye indicates problems and fears, eyelids indicate money and a loss indicates a loss of money. The interpretation of seeing a dream about the eye in a dream, the dream of seeing the eye around the eye in a dream, the dream of staring into the eyes shows that the dreamer is not religious. It affects his personal life. Interpretation of dreams about eyes: Seeing around the eye in a dream. Interpretation of seeing around the eye in a dream indicates a failure to fulfill a covenant. Seeing a red eye in a dream indicates hostility and competition between the dreamer and someone. Seeing someone in a dream with his eyes closed, but it She was beautiful in appearance, looking for a happy life. A dream in which you see a blue eye in a dream indicates that you do not follow morals and customs. Interpretation of a vision around the eye according to Al-Nabulsi: The interpretation of seeing eyelashes in a dream indicates illness and loss of money, but if the eyelashes are beautiful in appearance and not sick This indicates grace and kindness. Dreaming of seeing what is around the eye in a dream A dream of staring at the eyes indicates that the dreamer is not religious. Interpretation of a dream about the eyes of a single woman: Interpretation of seeing what is around the eyes in a dream about a single girl is a sign of the unhappy events that she will face. If she sees The girl in a dream places her eyes on her hand, this indicates anxiety and sadness. A dream about seeing an eye in a dream. A dream about an eye in a dream for an unmarried girl is an indication of unpleasant visions. Interpretation of a dream about an eye for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman’s eyes in a dream is evidence of the problems and difficulties she faces in Her life. Seeing the loss of an eye in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that she will lose her unborn child. The dream that she sees around the eye in a dream: A dream of redness or pain in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the emergence of a new crisis in her life. Interpretation of a vision around the eye for a married woman: Interpretation Seeing eye disease in general in a married woman’s dream is evidence of harm to her children. Cleaning the eye from damage in a dream is a sign of good offspring and the health of children. Seeing squint in the eye in a man’s dream. Squint in a dream indicates defects and defects in the personality of the dreamer, such as weakness of character and low judgment. Worship. If a married man sees that he is in a state of staring, and his eyes are in a normal state and he is not complaining of any illness, this may indicate his disobedience and worship of God. It also indicates mistreatment of his family. It can indicate the machinations and harassment of those around him. And if his eyes are around them, but Their appearance is beautiful, as this indicates the satisfaction of his desire for life and the death of problems and worries. Seeing an eye around in a dream If a young man sees that his eyes are round, this indicates his bad behavior and violations. He dreamed of seeing an eye in a dream, and this is what he replaced by making unhealthy decisions that can negatively affect Bad for the course of his life. This vision also shows the young man that his choice is a failure in his marriage, such as choosing a girl who does not suit him and causes him problems. Seeing an injury in the eye in a dream Seeing an injury in the eye is an unsuspecting sight and indicates troubles and troubles. Everything that draws attention in a dream

In the following lines, we will explain the details so that the reader is not distracted between the various indicators. Read with us to find out all the news. The Husband in a Dream Seeing the husband in a dream for the dreamer shows her bad psychological state due to her inability to overcome the adversities and crises that befall her due to enemies and deceivers. Seeing the husband marrying another woman In the sleeper’s dream, it indicates the love and friendship that binds them together and the stable life that he lives because of her support for him. The husband in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing the husband’s betrayal in a dream shows the dreamer the distressed situation that he will suffer from in the coming period as a result of wasting their money on buying useless things. And the husband dreams of his wife. This indicates the good news that she will learn in the coming of age and she will live with joy and happiness. Seeing the husband in the sleeper’s dream indicates the new changes that will occur in her future life and they will be for the better.
